title: Beginner English 104
headline: Study basic grammar and acquire vocabulary for identifying and describing family members in this free online course.
description: This free online course aims to develop your pronunciation and various grammatical topics, including the use of adjectives to describe people and using adverbs to add emphasis to sentences. We also review basic vocabulary about family to help you classify and describe those close to you. This course also includes learning how to talk about possessions and explores ways to form questions. Sign up to become more confident and proficient in English.
courseDescription:
This free online course covers pronunciation, vocabulary, and grammar. We start by showing you how to identify, classify, and pronounce vocabulary words related to family members and the roles they fulfill. We also explain how to talk about people's possessions while asking them questions about themselves.

The course then takes you through the use of adverbs such as 'very', 'so', and 'really', used to add emphasis to sentences, and using adjectives to describe people's actions, appearances, and personalities. We teach you how to ask questions that start with ‘Who’ to identify people and then look at questions that begin with the verb ‘Have’ to ask about belongings.

This free online course is suited to anyone who has just begun their journey of becoming more fluent in English but who is still growing accustomed to using this complex language. We offer clear explanations of grammatical principles and offer challenging assessments to help you monitor your progress throughout the course. Since English is such a universal language, learning it can open doors for you, so sign up today to develop and enhance your English skills.
